alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Sanilac; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Thunderstorms in Sanilac, Lapeer and St. Clair Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 743 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Deckerville to near Peck to Columbiaville. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 35 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could damage unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Peck and Melvin around 750 PM EDT. Croswell around 755 PM EDT. Lum around 800 PM EDT. Port Sanilac and Metamora around 805 PM EDT. Imlay City around 810 PM EDT. Lakeport and Dryden around 815 PM EDT. Almont around 820 PM EDT. Capac around 825 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include North Street, Goodland Township, Lynn Township, Amador, Brockway, Juhl, Elmer, Silverwood, New Greenleaf and Fort Gratiot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
